column1: Does your supervisor/line manager inform you about how well you are doing your work?
column2: Do you receive sufficient information on the results of your work?
column3: Does your work give you the opportunity to check on how well you are doing your work?
column4: Do you receive sufficient information on the purpose of your work?
column5: Does your work provide you with direct feedback on how well you are doing your work?
column6: Does your supervisor/line manager inform you about how well you are doing your work?
column7: Do your colleagues inform you about how well you are doing your work?
